info.title: VM Insights Onboarding
info.description: API to manage VM Insights Onboarding

get.description: Retrieves the VM Insights onboarding status for the specified resource or resource scope.

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The fully qualified Azure Resource manager identifier of the resource, or scope, whose status to retrieve.

default.description: An error occurred while processing the request. See the error.code parameter to identify the specific error.

DataContainer.description: Information about a container with data for a given resource.

code.description: Error code identifying the specific error.

message.description: Error message in the caller's locale.

ResponseWithError.description: An error response from the API.

data.description: Containers that currently store VM Insights data for the specified resource.

dataStatus.description: The status of VM Insights data from the resource. When reported as `present` the data array will contain information about the data containers to which data for the specified resource is being routed.

onboardingStatus.description: The onboarding status for the resource. Note that, a higher level scope, e.g., resource group or subscription, is considered onboarded if at least one resource under it is onboarded.

resourceId.description: Azure Resource Manager identifier of the resource whose onboarding status is being represented.

VMInsightsOnboardingStatus.description: VM Insights onboarding status for a resource.

id.description: Azure Resource Manager identifier of the Log Analytics Workspace.

location.description: Location of the Log Analytics workspace.

WorkspaceInfo.description: Information about a Log Analytics Workspace.
